To clean the bed, use a vacuum cleaner to remove any dirt and debris, and then use a damp cloth to wipe down the mattress and bed frame. For the radiator, use a cloth dampened with a mild detergent and water to remove dust and dirt.

To clean the bed, start by removing the sheets and pillowcases and washing them in the washing machine. Vacuum the mattress and use a damp cloth to spot clean any stains. Dust the headboard and frame, and mop the floor.
